title: Direction of magnetic field produced by wire

content.prompt: Which of the following is true about the direction of the magnetic field produced by the current at the position of the electron?

choices.label: It is toward the top of the page.
It is toward the bottom of the page.
It has no direction since there is no magnetic field at that point.

topic.text: 12.3: Magnetic Fields of Current-Carrying Wires and the Biot-Savart Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
